moves.1... e5: The classic From Gambit. Other strategies against the Bird don't work as well (especially 1...d5, the Reversed Dutch.)
moves.2. g4: A suicidal move (what else could it be?).
moves.2... Qh4+: Checkmate in two moves. How saddening. This is why I didn't say who white was.

gameName: How not to play the From Gambit
